phrases: That is what I am talking about.
Your blood pressure has gone down quite a bit.
But I am going to give you more medicine.
Idiot, I cannot give you that much.
Come back again next month for more.
Guess I will see you then.
But you really have changed, Someji.
A long time ago, you were like, I am not counting on any doctor!
You used to say, I will live how I want to, and die whenever!
Well, my wife and daughter left me with three little ones.
For them, I am all they have.
Come hell or high water, I have to stay alive until all three of them are married off.
No way can I let them stand in front of that gold leaf folding screen alone.
With Momo, it would help me out if she got married as soon as possible.
If she got married just after 20, I would be...
I cannot look after you for that long.
Five more days until the entrance exam.
Got hooked in, and crying as well
You have done everything you could.
Even your weakest area, proof problems, you got up to an average score of 80 or higher.
Now we should just review everything thoroughly.
And if there is anything you are still unsure of, we will practice it again with a worksheet.
he is going to a private school in Kouchi, Shikoku, thanks to a recommendation, huh?
When I saw her surprised face, which looked like that of a young child,
I would heard he was going to the high school affiliated with Meitei University.
That is what he said before.
I thought she already knew about it.
I wish I would never said anything.
What the hell am I doing?
With the exam just days away...
And she worked so hard for this, too.
I made her feel so terrible.
But she only feels this way because...
Oh, Hina, are you out grocery shopping?
It has not changed since I was a kid.
Drink Milk to Be Healthy Takahashi Milk
And at the edge of the shopping district...
Takahashi's family is having curry for dinner tonight.
I bet he will be happy about that.
And Chiho in Iwate is far from here.
I take it for granted that tomorrow will come like it always does...
and that I will always be able to see everyone.
But then I get a surprise.
Just like this, time after time...
Kiriyama, are you sure you do not mind?
I will stay here until you get back, Akari.
Besides, you helped me so much last year.
There is suddenly a party at my aunt's pub.
Momo's going to stay over at Grandpa's place!
I will come back as soon as I can.
The entrance exam is the day after tomorrow and I am like this.
Now you just need to rest up and recuperate as much as possible.
What will I do if the fever does not go down?
I forget everything I have learned?
In a little while, you can have some porridge, and then let us take some medicine.
Well, it is easier to sleep if it is dark, so I will close the door.
Call me if you need anything.
I will be right next door.
And by the morning of the exam,
her fever had dropped considerably, to just over 37 degrees.
Kiriyama has come to pick you up!
You did not have to go to the trouble.
Well, it is my day off anyway.
Well, you and the other exam-takers will be there, so we do not have class today.
During the time I had the fever,
I kept thinking about all the people I had lost...
and the tears would not stop.
The sidewalk's iced up, so it could be dangerous.
Kiriyama, you are kind of like a mother.
I feel like someone told me that before.
Mom, Grandma, please watch over Hina.
Not everyone has gone far away.
I must not ever forget that.
Eggplant and Meat Gratin with Plenty of Cheese
Tuna and Soft Boiled Egg Macaroni Salad
Mini Onigiri and Sweet Pickled Daikon Radish
I-It is like a mountain of fried meat!
A huge pile of macaroni salad!
With lots of tuna and soft boiled eggs!
I made all your favorites, Hina.
For tonight, fried foods are the beverages.
Since we are celebrating, I got carried away and deep-fried two kilograms of chicken.
I am moving up too, to senior year of preschool!
My little Hina is becoming a high school student.
But it is really all thanks to Rei.
Because you helped me with math, I was able to solve a lot of mysteries!
True, your average math score has gone up 30 points since Rei started tutoring you.
Even though you really did not like math!
I guess professional shogi players are smart cookies.
Can I call you Rei too?
The Night Before the Exam (Flash Back)
Y-You left the two of them alone in the house?
Kiriyama is that boy who is always over, right?
You left a third-year middle schooler and a second-year high schooler home alone this late?
Wh-What will you do if something happens?
If they make a mistake, it will be too late!
You need to go home right now!
Wh-What will we do if something happens to Hina?
Calm down, it is all right, Aunt.
There is nothing to worry about.
How can you be so blase?
Hey, Dad, are you okay with this?
No matter how well-behaved he is or that he is helping her study,
I cannot believe you are letting a young animal have the run of an all-female house.
What is this, all of a sudden?
What will we do if something happens to Hina?
After all, we are talking about the kid!
Not only Akari, but Dad too!
They fully trust a second-year high school boy?
Does he really such a safety piece?
I mean, I have doubts about boys these days.
Pet me, pet me, pet me right now!
Rei, I am looking forward to April.
Noguchi and the other members of the Shogi Science Club are graduating,
so I am happy that you are coming to my school.
And for some reason, Mr. Hayashida is thrilled about it too.
That is the teacher I met with the flume noodles, right?
I really do not know how to thank you, Rei.
Even though you had a lot of your own work to do,
you came here several times a week.
If I got bad results, she would have thought it was her fault,
so I played each and every match as carefully as possible.
It was a different way of facing things than I have done up to now.
Kid, you have about two more rank-deciding competitions for this period?
Right now I have eight wins.
So you will go up a class?
In that world, the kid is as terrifying as an ogre!
Oh man, this guy is scary!
That is a great thing, right?
- Cola! - You are too young for cola.
I hate to see her cry or be troubled about something.
I cannot stand the idea of her being in trouble with me not knowing about it.
So when I heard she wanted to come to a place that was within my reach,
I wanted to make sure she was accepted.
Until then, I thought that whether what I did was right or wrong
was something that other people would decide, as if in a trial.
when she said, I did not do anything wrong,
she still kept a firm grip on the helm of her heart.
a light within myself that I did not have before.
I won today, so I barely managed to avoid a demotion.
Looks like I will be in B-2 next period.
Maybe we can pick up where we left off last time.
Both of you, congratulations on your graduation.
I am going to do my best here, too.
My little sister is too cute!
I am never leaving the house again.
It is almost spring, so I will be a high school student, huh?
I am looking forward to being in the same school as Rei.
